Cache

发表于2022-05-06|更新于2022-05-06|计算机系统
|字数总计:3.9k|阅读时长:20分钟|阅读量:

好几个人跟我要过，那就直接发博客里吧。
采用的LRU算法。至于更牛的LRU-k算法我没有去写，应该不是很难写，不过需要有额外的数组啊什么的去记录状态信息，而且这好像并不符合老师规定（老师是这么跟我说的，他说不符合规定，不过可以试一下），如果有大佬写了，记得给我看一下。

以下采用的是LRU算法

代码

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////  Copyright 2020 by mars.                                        //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <time.h>
#include "common.h"

#define DEBUG	0      //判断是否出现错误

// 获得一个数的2的幂次
#define GET_POWER_OF_2(X)	(X == 0x00		? 0 : \
							X == 0x01		? 0 : \
							X == 0x02		? 1 : \
							X == 0x04		? 2 : \
							X == 0x08		? 3 : \
							X == 0x10		? 4 : \
							X == 0x20		? 5 : \
							X == 0x40		? 6 : \
							X == 0x80		? 7 : \
							X == 0x100		? 8 : \
							X == 0x200		? 9 : \
							X == 0x400		? 10 : \
							X == 0x800		? 11 : \
							X == 0x1000		? 12 : \
							X == 0x2000		? 13 : \
							X == 0x4000		? 14 : \
							X == 0x8000		? 15 : \
							X == 0x10000	? 16 : \
							X == 0x20000	? 17 : \
							X == 0x40000	? 18 : \
							X == 0x80000	? 19 : \
							X == 0x100000	? 20 : \
							X == 0x200000	? 21 : \
							X == 0x400000	? 22 : \
							X == 0x800000	? 23 : \
							X == 0x1000000	? 24 : \
							X == 0x2000000	? 25 : \
							X == 0x4000000	? 26 : \
							X == 0x8000000	? 27 : \
							X == 0x10000000	? 28 : \
							X == 0x20000000	? 29 : \
							X == 0x40000000	? 30 : \
							X == 0x80000000	? 31 : \
							X == 0x100000000	? 32 : 0)

/*
	 Cache，16KB大小    2^14
*/

#define DCACHE_SIZE						16384									// 16KB
#define DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE			8										// 块的大小（必须是8字节的倍数）
#define DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS	GET_POWER_OF_2(DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE)	// 块对应的地址位数
#define DE								128										// 每组的行数（2的幂次）
#define DCACHE_SET						(DCACHE_SIZE/DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE/DE)	// 组数
#define DCACHE_SET_ADDR_BITS			GET_POWER_OF_2(DCACHE_SET)				// 组对应的地址位数

#define ICACHE_SIZE						16384									// 16KB
#define ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE			8										// 块的大小（必须是8字节的倍数）
#define ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS	GET_POWER_OF_2(ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE)	// 块对应的地址位数
#define IE								8										// 每组的行数（2的幂次）
#define ICACHE_SET						(ICACHE_SIZE/ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE/IE)	// 组数
#define ICACHE_SET_ADDR_BITS			GET_POWER_OF_2(ICACHE_SET)				// 组对应的地址位数



// Cache行的结构，包括Valid、Tag和Data。你所有的状态信息，只能记录在Cache行中！
struct DCACHE_LineStruct
{
	UINT32	Num;							//LRU算法
	UINT8	Dirty;							//是否污染(0污染；1未污染)
	UINT8	Valid;							//有效位  
	UINT64	Tag;							//标识位  
	UINT8	Data[DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE];		//DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE个字节
}DCache[DCACHE_SET][DE];		//组数

/*
	DCache初始化代码，一般需要把DCache的有效位Valid设置为0
	模拟器启动时，会调用此InitDataCache函数
*/
void InitDataCache()
{
	UINT32 i;
	UINT32 j;
	printf("[%s] +-----------------------------------+\n", __func__);
	printf("[%s] |   yyh的Data Cache初始化ing.... |\n", __func__);
	printf("[%s] +-----------------------------------+\n", __func__);
	for (i = 0; i < DCACHE_SET; i++) {    //初始化
		for (j = 0;j < DE;j++) {
			DCache[i][j].Valid = 0;
			DCache[i][j].Dirty = 0;
			DCache[i][j].Num = 0;
		}
	}
}

/*
	将Data Cache中的一行数据，写入存储器
*/
void StoreDataCacheLineToMemory(UINT64 Address, UINT32 CacheLineAddress, UINT32 j)
{
	// 一次性将DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE数据从某个Data Cache行写入Memory中
	// 提供了一个函数，一次可以写入8个字节
	UINT32 i;
	UINT64 WriteData;
	UINT64 AlignAddress;
	UINT64* pp;

	AlignAddress = Address & ~(DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE - 1);	// 地址必须对齐到DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE 字节边界
	pp = (UINT64*)DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data;
	WriteData = 0;
	for (i = 0; i < DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE / 8; i++)
	{
		WriteData = pp[i];
		WriteMemory(AlignAddress + 8LL * i, WriteData);
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX ReadData=%016llX\n", __func__, AlignAddress + 8LL * i, WriteData);
	}
}


/*
	从Memory中读入一行数据到Data Cache中
*/
UINT32 LoadDataCacheLineFromMemory(UINT64 Address, UINT32 CacheLineAddress, UINT64 AddressTag)
{
	// 一次性从Memory中将DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE数据读入某个Data Cache行
	// 提供了一个函数，一次可以读入8个字节
	UINT32 i;
	UINT32 j;
	UINT64 ReadData;     //8个字节
	UINT64 AlignAddress;
	UINT64* pp;

	AlignAddress = Address & ~(DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE - 1);	// 地址必须对齐到DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE (64)字节边界
	for (j = 0;j < DE;j++) {
		if (DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Valid == 0) {
			break;
		}
	}
	if (j == DE) {	//说明所有位都有效，采取LRU
		UINT32 mx = DCache[CacheLineAddress][0].Num;
		j = 0;
		for (UINT32 temp1 = 1; temp1 < DE; temp1++) {    //LRU
			if (DCache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num > mx) {
				mx = DCache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num;
				j = temp1;
			}
		}
	}
	if (DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Dirty == 1) {   //被污染了
		UINT64 OldAddress;
		OldAddress = ((DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Tag << DCACHE_SET_ADDR_BITS) << DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS) | ((UINT64)CacheLineAddress << DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS);	// 从Tag中恢复旧的地址
		StoreDataCacheLineToMemory(OldAddress, CacheLineAddress, j);
	}
	pp = (UINT64*)DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data;   //找到对应的组数、行数
	for (i = 0; i < DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE / 8; i++)
	{
		ReadData = ReadMemory(AlignAddress + 8LL * i);      //读八个字节（从偏移量0开始）
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX ReadData=%016llX\n", __func__, AlignAddress + 8LL * i, ReadData);
		pp[i] = ReadData;
	}
	DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Dirty = 0;
	DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Valid = 1;
	DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Tag = AddressTag;
	//for (i = 0;i < E;i++) {
	//	DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Num++;
	//}
	DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Num = 0;
	return j;
}

/*
	Data Cache访问接口，系统模拟器会调用此接口，来实现对你的Data Cache访问
	Address:	访存字节地址
	Operation:	操作：读操作（'L'）、写操作（'S'）、读-修改-写操作（'M'）
	DataSize:	数据大小：1字节、2字节、4字节、8字节
	StoreValue:	当执行写操作的时候，需要写入的数据
	LoadResult:	当执行读操作的时候，从Cache读出的数据
*/
UINT8 AccessDataCache(UINT64 Address, UINT8 Operation, UINT8 DataSize, UINT64 StoreValue, UINT64* LoadResult)
{
	UINT32 CacheLineAddress;    //找对应的组数
	UINT8 BlockOffset;			//偏移量
	UINT64 AddressTag;			//Tag标记
	UINT8 MissFlag = 'M';		//是否命中
	UINT64 ReadValue;
	UINT32 i;
	UINT8 Flag = 0;
	*LoadResult = 0;
	UINT32 j;

	/*
	*	Address被切分为  AddressTag，CacheLineAddress，BlockOffset
	*/

	// CacheLineAddress Cache的组号（每组E行）
	CacheLineAddress = (Address >> DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS) % DCACHE_SET;
	BlockOffset = Address % DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE;
	AddressTag = (Address >> DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS) >> DCACHE_SET_ADDR_BITS;	// 地址去掉DCACHE_SET、DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE，剩下的作为Tag。警告！不能将整个地址作为Tag！！

	for (i = 0;i < DE;i++) {
		if (DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Valid == 1 && DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Tag == AddressTag) {
			Flag = 1;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (Flag == 1)
	{
		MissFlag = 'H';		// 命中！
		for (UINT32 temp1 = 0; temp1 < DE; temp1++) {    //更新
			DCache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num++;
		}
		DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Num = 0;
		if (Operation == 'L')	// 读操作
		{
			ReadValue = 0;
			switch (DataSize)
			{
			case 1:	// 1个字节
				ReadValue = DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0];
				break;
			case 2:	// 2个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFE;	// 需对齐到2字节边界
				ReadValue = DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;  //小端格式（移8是因为每个字节8位）
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0];
				break;
			case 4:	// 4个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFC;	// 需对齐到4字节边界
				ReadValue = DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 3]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;   //同上
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 2]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0];
				break;
			case 8:	// 8个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xF8;	// 需对齐到8字节边界
				ReadValue = DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 7]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;   //同上
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 6]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 5]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 4]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 3]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 2]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
				ReadValue |= DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0];
				break;
			}
			*LoadResult = ReadValue;
			if (DEBUG)
				printf("[%s] Address=%016llX Operation=%c DataSize=%u StoreValue=%016llX ReadValue=%016llX\n", __func__, Address, Operation, DataSize, StoreValue, ReadValue);
		}
		else if (Operation == 'S' || Operation == 'M')	// 写操作（修改操作在此等价于写操作）
		{
			if (DEBUG)
				printf("[%s] Address=%016llX Operation=%c DataSize=%u StoreValue=%016llX\n", __func__, Address, Operation, DataSize, StoreValue);
			switch (DataSize)
			{
			case 1:	// 1个字节
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF;    //8位（1个字节）
				break;
			case 2:	// 2个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFE;	// 需对齐到2字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			case 4:	// 4个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFC;	// 需对齐到4字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 2] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 3] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			case 8:	// 8个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xF8;	// 需对齐到8字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 2] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 3] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 4] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 5] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 6] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Data[BlockOffset + 7] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			}
			DCache[CacheLineAddress][i].Dirty = 1;     //被污染了
		}
	}
	else   //不命中（读不命中，写不命中）
	{
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX Operation=%c DataSize=%u StoreValue=%016llX\n", __func__, Address, Operation, DataSize, StoreValue);
		MissFlag = 'M';		// 不命中

		// 需要从Memory中读入新的行（真实情况下，这个LoadCacheLineFromMemory需要很长时间的）
		j = LoadDataCacheLineFromMemory(Address, CacheLineAddress, AddressTag);    //把一整行都读进去（不去考虑偏移量这个问题）
		if (Operation == 'L')	// 读操作
		{
			// 读操作不需要做事情，因为已经MISS了
		}
		else if (Operation == 'S' || Operation == 'M')	// 写操作（修改操作在此等价于写操作）
		{
			// 写操作，需要将新的StoreValue更新到CacheLine中
			switch (DataSize)
			{
			case 1:	// 1个字节
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			case 2:	// 2个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFE;	// 需对齐到2字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			case 4:	// 4个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFC;	// 需对齐到4字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 2] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 3] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			case 8:	// 8个字节
				BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xF8;	// 需对齐到8字节边界
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 0] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 1] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 2] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 3] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 4] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 5] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 6] = StoreValue & 0xFF; StoreValue = StoreValue >> 8;
				DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Data[BlockOffset + 7] = StoreValue & 0xFF;
				break;
			}
			DCache[CacheLineAddress][j].Dirty = 1;
		}
	}
	return MissFlag;
}

// Cache行的结构，包括Valid、Tag和Data。你所有的状态信息，只能记录在Cache行中！
struct ICACHE_LineStruct
{
	UINT32	Num;							//LRU算法
	UINT8	Valid;							//有效位  
	UINT64	Tag;							//标识位  
	UINT8	Inst[ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE];		//ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE个字节
}ICache[ICACHE_SET][IE];		//组数


/* 指令Cache实现部分，可选实现 */
void InitInstCache(void)
{
	UINT32 i;
	UINT32 j;
	printf("[%s] +-----------------------------------+\n", __func__);
	printf("[%s] |   yyh的Inst Cache初始化ing.... |\n", __func__);
	printf("[%s] +-----------------------------------+\n", __func__);
	for (i = 0; i < ICACHE_SET; i++) {    //初始化
		for (j = 0;j < IE;j++) {
			ICache[i][j].Valid = 0;
			ICache[i][j].Num = 0;
		}
	}
	return;
}

void LoadInstCacheLineFromMemory(UINT64 Address, UINT32 CacheLineAddress, UINT64 AddressTag)
{
	// 一次性从Memory中将DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE数据读入某个Data Cache行
	// 提供了一个函数，一次可以读入8个字节
	UINT32 i;
	UINT32 j;
	UINT64 ReadInst;     //8个字节
	UINT64 AlignAddress;
	UINT64* pp;

	AlignAddress = Address & ~(ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE - 1);	// 地址必须对齐到ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE (64)字节边界
	for (j = 0;j < IE;j++) {
		if (ICache[CacheLineAddress][j].Valid == 0) {
			break;
		}
	}
	if (j == IE) {	//说明所有位都有效，采取LRU
		UINT32 mx = ICache[CacheLineAddress][0].Num;
		j = 0;
		for (UINT32 temp1 = 1; temp1 < IE; temp1++) {    //LRU
			if (ICache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num > mx) {
				mx = ICache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num;
				j = temp1;
			}
		}
	}
	pp = (UINT64*)ICache[CacheLineAddress][j].Inst;   //找到对应的组数、行数
	for (i = 0; i < ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE / 8; i++)
	{
		ReadInst = ReadMemory(AlignAddress + 8LL * i);      //读八个字节（从偏移量0开始）
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX ReadInst=%016llX\n", __func__, AlignAddress + 8LL * i, ReadInst);
		pp[i] = ReadInst;
	}
	ICache[CacheLineAddress][j].Valid = 1;
	ICache[CacheLineAddress][j].Tag = AddressTag;
	ICache[CacheLineAddress][j].Num = 0;
	return;
}

UINT8 AccessInstCache(UINT64 Address, UINT8 Operation, UINT8 InstSize, UINT64* InstResult)
{
	UINT32 CacheLineAddress;    //找对应的组数
	UINT8 BlockOffset;			//偏移量
	UINT64 AddressTag;			//Tag标记
	UINT8 MissFlag = 'M';		//是否命中
	UINT64 ReadValue;
	UINT32 i;
	UINT8 Flag = 0;
	*InstResult = 0;
	UINT32 j;

	/*
	*	Address被切分为  AddressTag，CacheLineAddress，BlockOffset
	*/

	// CacheLineAddress Cache的组号（每组E行）
	CacheLineAddress = (Address >> ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS) % ICACHE_SET;
	BlockOffset = Address % ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE;
	AddressTag = (Address >> ICACHE_INST_PER_LINE_ADDR_BITS) >> ICACHE_SET_ADDR_BITS;	// 地址去掉DCACHE_SET、DCACHE_DATA_PER_LINE，剩下的作为Tag。警告！不能将整个地址作为Tag！！

	for (i = 0;i < IE;i++) {
		if (ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Valid == 1 && ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Tag == AddressTag) {
			Flag = 1;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (Flag == 1)
	{
		MissFlag = 'H';		// 命中！
		for (UINT32 temp1 = 0; temp1 < IE; temp1++) {    //更新
			ICache[CacheLineAddress][temp1].Num++;
		}
		ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Num = 0;
		ReadValue = 0;
		switch (InstSize)
		{
		case 1:	// 1个字节
			ReadValue = ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 0];
			break;
		case 2:	// 2个字节
			BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFE;	// 需对齐到2字节边界
			ReadValue = ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;  //小端格式（移8是因为每个字节8位）
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 0];
			break;
		case 4:	// 4个字节
			BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xFC;	// 需对齐到4字节边界
			ReadValue = ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 3]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;   //同上
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 2]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 0];
			break;
		case 8:	// 8个字节
			BlockOffset = BlockOffset & 0xF8;	// 需对齐到8字节边界
			ReadValue = ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 7]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;   //同上
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 6]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 5]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 4]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 3]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 2]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 1]; ReadValue = ReadValue << 8;
			ReadValue |= ICache[CacheLineAddress][i].Inst[BlockOffset + 0];
			break;
		}
		*InstResult = ReadValue;
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX Operation=%c InstSize=%u ReadValue=%016llX\n", __func__, Address, Operation, InstSize, ReadValue);
	}
	else   //不命中（读不命中）
	{
		if (DEBUG)
			printf("[%s] Address=%016llX Operation=%c InstSize=%u \n", __func__, Address, Operation, InstSize);
		MissFlag = 'M';		// 不命中

		// 需要从Memory中读入新的行（真实情况下，这个LoadCacheLineFromMemory需要很长时间的）
		LoadInstCacheLineFromMemory(Address, CacheLineAddress,AddressTag);    //把一整行都读进去（不去考虑偏移量这个问题）
	}
	return MissFlag;
}

结果
